lead_paragraph: The Toronto Blue Jays have released the right-hander Víctor Zambrano.The 31-year-old Zambrano appeared in eight games with Toronto, including two starts, going 0-2 with a 10.97 earned run average.Zambrano signed with the Blue Jays as a free agent on Jan. 30 after an injury-filled stint with the Mets. In 2004, the Mets acquired Zambrano in a deal that sent one of their top pitching prospects, Scott Kazmir, to the Tampa Bay Devil Rays.
